timeline.message:
fix: Use TrackedEntityAttributeValueService to update values in SMS submissions

Fix will make sure that values updated through SMS are also reflected on the web.
refactor: reduce metadata calls for SMS

timeline.bodyText: I hate to harp on this, but we use Uid instead of UID in DHIS 2. Using camel case even for acronyms is a standard Java convention. Would you mind changing it to getUid() ?
timeline.author: larshelge

replies.author: JasperTimm

replies.bodyText: Also I've just noticed a lot of the existing SMS listener code already used SMS in its class names. I suppose we should be consistent and update all these too?
replies.author: JasperTimm

replies.bodyText:
Okay great, thanks @JasperTimm. To avoid a growing task let's leave it at Uids for now.
It would be great if you could update the 2.33 and 2.34 PRs as well, for consistency and for easier future backports.
replies.author: larshelge

timeline.message:
update pom.xml

changed sms-compression library version
